programme.title: The First 48 - After the First 48: Murder on the Interstate / At Close Range Update
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 99 Now that some of our strongest cases have been adjudicated, we can take viewers inside the powerful and dramatic events that unfolded after the arrest, up to and including the conviction.

programme.title: The First 48 - After the First 48: Fool for Love / Crash
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 98 Now that some of our strongest cases have been adjudicated, we can take viewers inside the powerful and dramatic events that unfolded after the arrest, up to and including the conviction.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Dumped
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 7 In Memphis, Tennessee a man's body is found dumped in a field. Despite every effort, the case goes cold and the murderer remains a mystery. For six years the victim's father investigates the murder on his own, trying to find out who killed his son.

programme.title: After the First 48 - House of Rage
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 9 A mother of five young boys is found shot to death in her Cleveland, Ohio apartment. A witness emerges, guiding detectives to a critical piece of evidence.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Prince of Darkness / Last Words
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 11 In Harris County Texas, a young mother of three daughters is found in her trailer with her throat slashed. Investigators arrest her alleged killer with the help of a key witness.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Bad Company
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 8 On a warm, clear night in the desert near Lake Mead, the body of a man--shot dead--was found in the middle of the road. When Las Vegas Metro homicide detectives began investigating the death, they had no idea the case would lead them to a conspiracy.

programme.title: The First 48 - Ringside Seat
programme.desc: Season 16, Episode 2 Tulsa homicide delves into a dark world of drugs and prostitution to solve the murder of a man executed in his car in a motel parking lot.

programme.title: The First 48 - The Passenger/ Death Call
programme.desc: Season 16, Episode 4 When a Tulsa man is gunned down at the wheel of his car detectives turn to a passenger who saw it all.

programme.title: The First 48 - Fast Friends /The Thin Line
programme.desc: Season 16, Episode 6 In Cleveland, a young father is murdered in his car and detectives discover his friend may know who pulled the trigger.

programme.title: The First 48 - Stray Shot
programme.desc: Season 16, Episode 7 When a stray shot leaves an innocent man dead in his home, Tulsa detectives discover a neighborhood under siege by young terrors.

programme.title: The First 48 - Cranked
programme.desc: Season 16, Episode 8 When an innocent father is brutally stabbed, Tulsa Detective Justin Ritter delves into the dark and dangerous world of methamphetamine addiction in order to stop a killer.

programme.title: The First 48 - Bad Love
programme.desc: Season 16, Episode 10 In Tulsa, a young woman is brutally gunned down in broad daylight. And Detective Justin Ritter suspects the witnesses know more than they are saying.

programme.title: The First 48 - Ringside Seat
programme.desc: Season 16, Episode 2 Tulsa homicide delves into a dark world of drugs and prostitution to solve the murder of a man executed in his car in a motel parking lot.

programme.title: Murder Chose Me - Looking for Love
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 4 A chance meeting goes terribly awry for a good-natured Vietnam vet.

programme.title: Murder Chose Me - The Woman in the Leopard Dress
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 5 A drunken brawl at a bar culminates in the stabbing death of a regular.

programme.title: Murder Chose Me - Snake Eyes
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 6 Casino surveillance leads Detective Rod Demery to an unexpected killer.

programme.title: The First 48 - House of Horrors/Final Sacrifice
programme.desc: Season 18, Episode 21 In Tulsa, a vicious hammer attack leaves two young men clinging to life. Detectives race to catch the suspect before he strikes again.

programme.title: The First 48 - A Murder in Mobile
programme.desc: Season 18, Episode 22 When a homeless man is gunned down on the sidewalk, Mobile detectives discover a petty motive.

programme.title: After the First 48 - After the First 48 - 17
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 12 In March of 2008, Tucson Detectives Jennifer Whitfield and Mike Carroll were called to investigate the robbery/homicide of a 27-year-old cab driver.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Innocent Lost
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 13 In July of 2006, Miami detectives Rolando Garcia and Orlando Silva responded to the shooting death of nine-year-old Sherdavia Jenkins. After a three-week investigation, detectives were able to close their case, charging two men with second-degree murder.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Gun Play / No-Tell Motel
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 14 Tucson, Arizona. Sixteen-year-old Derreck Burruss and his friends were walking home when they were confronted by two men.

programme.title: After the First 48 - After The First 48: Drama at The Classic/50G Murder
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 15 On October 26, 2008, Birmingham homicide detectives were helping with crowd control at the Magic City Classic--a renowned football game between two of the oldest black colleges in Alabama.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - The Zombiecon Shooting
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 308 Zombiecon Shooting tracks the two-a-half-year investigation into the crime and how the FBI and FMPD identified the killer and brought him to justice.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - Conned to Death
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 309 The death of Michele MacNeill, and how her family, determined to get justice for her, led investigators to finally uncover the incredible circumstances surrounding her murder.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - Terror on Thanksgiving
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 310 Terror on Thanksgiving follows the police and forensics investigation that solves the heartrending murder of Kelsey Berreth.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - The Murder of Susannah Chase
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 311 The Murder of Susannah Chase follows the investigation into Susannah’s murder, and how law enforcement and forensics eventually tracked down her killer after more than two decades.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - Turnabout Intruder
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 24 The Enterprise is in danger when Janice Lester, one of Kirk's former lovers, steals his body.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Best of Both Worlds (Part 1)
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 174 Responding to a distress call on one of the Federation's outer-most colonies, the Enterprise arrives...only to find a big hole in the ground where the town used to be, and discovers the Borg are behind the attack.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Best of Both Worlds (Part 2)
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 175 Commander Riker had no choice as acting captain but fire full force on the Borg starship, despite Picard being on board of it, altered to a Borg calling himself Locutus, both ships are damaged.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Family
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 178 After defeating the Borg, the crew of the Enterprise experiences shore leave in various ways. Captain Picard's return to his family's vineyard in France has some extraordinary repercussions following his time spent as a member of the Borg collective.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Brothers
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 177 After an accident aboard the Enterprise leaves one of its children in grave danger, Data commandeers the Enterprise, driven to take him to an unknown origin, where an interesting figures awaits.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Suddenly Human
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 176 On a rescue mission to an alien shipwrecked training mission, they discover one of its trainees to be a human.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Remember Me
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 179 Dr. Crusher's fear of losing loved ones becomes real when her worries create an alternate reality.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Legacy
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 180 The crew of the Enterprise enters into orbit around the home planet of their former crew-mate, Tasha Yar, where they encounter her sister.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Reunion
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 181 When the head of the Klingon high council passes on, Picard finds himself in the middle of the struggle for the now-vacant position. Meanwhile, Worf re-unites with a past love, only to find he now has a son.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Future Imperfect
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 182 Riker has to quit his birthday party during a so-far uneventful patrol voyage at the Neutral Zone to head an away team when a Romulan secret base is found on a planet which was believed uninhabited.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Final Mission
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 183 Before leaving for Starfleet Academy, Wesley Crusher accompanies Captain Picard on a dangerous mission.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Loss
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 184 As an unknown force drags the Enterprise, Deanna Troi struggles with the loss of her powers.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Data's Day
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 185 Data tries to comprehend the complex emotions between O'Brien and Keiko, who are about to be married.

programme.title: Farscape - Farscape: S3 E3 - Self Inflicted Wounds, Part 1: Could'a, Would'a, Should'a
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 3 Moya approaches a wormhole, gets pulled in and fused to another ship.

programme.title: Farscape - Farscape: S3 E4 - Self Inflicted Wounds, Part 2: Wait For The Wheel
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 4 The crew works out a way of getting free from the other ship and out of the wormhole.

programme.title: Robocop (2014) - Robocop (2014)
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 In 2028 Detroit, when Alex Murphy (Joel Kinnaman) -- a loving husband, father and good cop -- is critically injured in the line of duty, the multinational conglomerate OmniCorp sees their chance for a part-man, part-robot police officer.

programme.title: Robocop 2 - Robocop 2
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 This first sequel pits Robocop against a gang of drug dealers and the title creature--a supposedly improved version of himself that has gone berserk.

programme.title: Robocop 3 - Robocop 3
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 In this second sequel to the 1987 hit, RoboCop leaves the force and joins the rebellion to battle the evil business corporation OCP, which uses a police-like group to remove the homeless people who populate the site of a future upscale development.

programme.title: Robot Jox - Robot Jox
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 This thrilling sci-fi adventure will satisfy your burning desire for robot-on-robot action when the world's disputes are settled using massive battling 'bots! But when tragedy and treachery rear their ugly heads, one 'bot pilot is out for revenge!

programme.title: RoboCop: The Series - 101 - The Future of Law Enforcement
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 RoboCop is back to provide justice in Delta City. While investigating the murders of several homeless people, he uncovers some of the city's darker secrets.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - HOME SOIL
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 117 Picard finds himself facing a strenuous test of his loyalty to Starfleet, one which the other members of the crew are struggling to cope with, whilst Wesley faces an equally challenging entrance exam at Starfleet Academy.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - EVOLUTION*
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 150 The Enterprise is carrying an eminent scientist, Dr. Paul Stubbs, to the site of a binary star where they are expecting a massive stellar explosion to occur in a few hours.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - LEGACY
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 180 The crew of the Enterprise enters into orbit around the home planet of their former crew-mate, Tasha Yar, where they encounter her sister.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Future's End, Part 2
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 9 The crew races against time to stop a 20th century computer industrialist from causing a 29th century disaster.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Warlord
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 10 Kes's body is taken over by the mind of a ruthless political leader who's determined to regain control of his planet.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - The Q And The Grey
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 11 Janeway is stunned when Q asks her to be the mother of his child.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Macrocosm
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 12 Janeway, Neelix and the Doctor must retake Voyager from an infestation of microorganisms.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Fair Trade
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 13 Neelix's efforts to assist the crew wind up involving him in a deadly narcotics ring.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Alter Ego
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 14 A Holodeck character's obsession with Tuvok threatens to destroy Voyager.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Coda
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 15 Janeway finds herself trapped in a mysterious time loop, where a series of events repeatedly end in her death.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Blood Fever
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 16 A Vulcan mating ritual pits Torres against a fellow crewmember, while Chakotay makes a shocking discovery about invaders of a strange planet.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Unity
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 17 Chakotay finds a planet of unassimilated Borg drones from all over the galaxy.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Darkling
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 18 After the Doctor adds a mix of new sub-routines to his program, his personality turns violent.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Rise!
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 19 The crew tries to help the inhabitants of a planet that's being bombarded by deadly asteroids.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Favorite Son
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 20 Kim becomes convinced he's a native of Taresia, a planet inhabited primarily by women.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Before And After
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 21 On her deathbed, Kes is bewildered when she begins reliving her life moving backwards in time.

programme.desc: Season 11, Episode 12 This episode includes: Suspect Turned Victim & UD, David Lee Kemp & UD, Internet Abduction & UD and Love is Blind.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 22 The killing of a woman in a VA goes unsolved for a quarter of a century before investigators are finally able to zero in on the likely killer. And, in 1999 detectives test the blood evidence and develop a DNA profile of a shooting death from 1980.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 14 It takes nine years and the work of cutting-edge forensic toxicologists to solve the murder of a medical examiner's wife. Then, a determined Alabama sheriff reopens the case of the deaths of two babies, hoping to get their mother to confess.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 17 A look at the case of James Allen Selby, a serial rapist who eluded police for years while attacking 11 women in five states - Oklahoma, Nevada, California, Arizona, and Colorado.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Traces Of Murder/The Bathtub Killer
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 9 A killer helps convict himself when he boasts about his crime to prison cellmates; and New Hampshire investigators probing the murder of a pregnant woman found raped, strangled, and dumped into her bathtub, get a new lead.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 11 A boy's toy Batmobile car provides an important clue for detectives struggling to make a case against a serial killer who stalks and kills waitresses.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 25 A murderer's saliva, found on envelopes, helps seal his doom 37 years after his first killing. And Colorado police crack a cold case 24 years later when they take a DNA sample from the victim's son that proves that his father murdered his mother.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 11 Police in Overland Park, Kansas, hunt for over 15 years for a serial killer who lures women to Kansas for sadomasochistic sexual trysts at hotels.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 1 After 46 years, LA homicide detectives take a Lover's Lane bandit who also gunned down two police officers into custody. Then, DNA testing helps lead police in Florida to a suspected killer, however, the killer has an identical twin.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 15 A new fingerprint identification system helps detectives track down a killer after three years of searching. And a Georgia investigator gets to the bottom of a 16-year-old murder case when he discovers the victim's body -- in the bottom of a well.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 5 A 13-year-old girl's mother is murdered and 20 years later she helps bring the killer to justice, and a dogged policeman gets to the bottom of the brutal murder of a 63-year-old newspaper delivery woman.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 20 DNA found on a marijuana joint in Florida in 2005 helps to solve the 1988 rape and murder of a California woman. And a cold case of murder in Illinois heats up when a jailhouse lawyer turns jailhouse snitch.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 3 While hiking with husband Dennis in Montana, Leslee Larson fell into Wolf Creek. Then Dennis is convicted of murdering his wife, while in Main. And 15-year-old papergirl Penny Parker goes missing, then her body is found by a search volunteer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 23 The brutal stabbing murder of a Florida woman is solved when police find crucial DNA evidence in spit left on the pavement. And a man is put away for rape and murder when his footprint matches the footprint he left at the crime scene 18 years before.

programme.title: MST3K: Master Ninja II - MST3K: Master Ninja II
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Joel and the 'bots endure two equally bad episodes from the failed action seriesThe Master(1984).

programme.title: MST3K: Mad Monster - MST3K: Mad Monster
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Things get hairy on the Satellite of Love thanks to the lupine antics of The Mad Monster (1942) and the second chapter of Radar Men from the Moon (1952).

programme.title: MST3K: The Christmas Dragon - MST3K: The Christmas Dragon
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 All three hosts watch a group of precocious orphans attempt save a dying Father Christmas in THE CHRISTMAS DRAGON (2014).

programme.title: MST3K Shorts - MST3K Shorts: The Sport Parade: Snow Thrills
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 13 A classic newsreel that highlights various winter sports.

programme.title: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Santa Claus - Santa Claus
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 27 Mike and the bots watch Santa Claus mess around with a devil while trying to deliver gifts and then sing politically correct holiday songs.

programme.title: MST3K: Santa Claus Conquers The Martians - MST3K: Santa Claus Conquers The Martians
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Martians abduct Santa Claus and two human children in hopes of bringing Christmas to their planet.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts - MST3K Shorts: Out Of This World
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 22 It's Heaven vs. Hell in this short. Plus: bread?

programme.title: MST3K: Teenage Caveman - MST3K: Teenage Caveman
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 In Teenage Cave Man (1958), a rebellious cave boy goes against clan rules and wants to explore horizons beyond the river

programme.title: MST3K: The Beast Of Yucca Flats - MST3K: The Beast Of Yucca Flats
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 After a devastating atomic test, Joseph Javorsky, a defecting Russian scientist, is transformed into a murderous radioactive beast. Can desert patrolmen Jim Archer and Joe Dobson stop the creature before it kills again?

programme.title: Wedding of Dreams - Wedding of Dreams
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Hallmark Original Movie. In the sequel to Summer of Dreams, it's been a year since Debbie's smash hit.

programme.title: Good Witch - A Budding Romance
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 1 Hallmark Original Series. The whole town anxiously awaits the impending blooming of the Middleton.

programme.title: A Dog Named Christmas - A Dog Named Christmas
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A developmentally-challenged young man is determined to prove to his family that he can care for a dog on his own. In his triumph, he inspires his father to love the new member of the family. Stars Bruce Greenwood, Linda Emond.

programme.title: A Season for Miracles - A Season for Miracles
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 With a little help from an angel, Christmas miracles happen for a homeless family. Stars Patty Duke, Laura Dern, Carla Gugino, Lynn Redgrave, and Kathy Baker. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.title: Broadcasting Christmas - Broadcasting Christmas
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Two exes compete for the same co-host position at the nation's favorite morning show in Manhattan. They'll both do what it takes to get ahead, but the fire that burned between them hasn't quite burned out.

programme.title: Plainsong - Plainsong
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Tom, a high school history teacher, is faced with raising two young sons after his wife leaves him. Maggie, a fellow teacher, tries to provide comfort and support. Gradually, they grow to need and depend on each other.

programme.title: William Faulkner's Old Man - William Faulkner's Old Man
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Set in the 1920s, a prison inmate is tempted by the opportunity to escape during a Mississippi flood. Stars Jeanne Tripplehorn and Arliss Howard. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.title: Window Wonderland - Window Wonderland
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Hallmark Original Movie. Sloan Van Doren is hoping to take over the head window designer spot.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Point Of No Return
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 11 When a quirky conspiracy theorist contacts SG-1 claiming to know classified information about the Stargate, at first they think he's bluffing. But when they investigate his wild claims, they realize he's a lot closer to the truth than they thought.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Tangent
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 12 When O'Neill and Teal'c take an SGC-modified Goa'uld glider out for a test flight, they lose control and are sucked into outer space by a Goa'uld tracking device. It's up to the team to rescue them, before they run out oxygen and life support.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - The Curse
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 13 When Daniel Jackson returns to Chicago to attend the funeral of his mentor, a celebrated archaeologist, he soon realizes that the death is mysteriously connected to the recent discovery of a 10,000-year-old Egyptian artifact that might be cursed.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - The Serpent's Venom
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 14 SG-1 travels to a remote interplanetary minefield to sabotage a hazardous alliance between two powerful Goa'uld System Lords. But their mission becomes far more dangerous when they realize Teal'c has been captured by one of the Lords.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Chain Reaction
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 15 When SGC commander Gen. Hammond steps down saying he's too old for the job, SG-1 suspects foul play. When a hard-nosed new general steps in to replace him and splits up SG-1, they vow to solve the mystery and get their beloved General back.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - 2010
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 16 A decade in the future, Earth's alliance with a highly intelligent race of aliens has rendered SGC obsolete. But when Carter, now married to an ambassador, uncovers a terrifying secret, she must reassemble SG-1 to send an urgent message to the past.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Absolute Power
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 17 When a chosen boy is brought to SGC, he sends a telepathic message, causing Daniel's personality to undergo disturbing changes. Will the rest of SG-1 be able to solve the mystery of the boy's origin before he becomes a power-hungry warmonger?

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - The Light
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 18 SG-1 travels to a planet to investigate a machine that induces narcotic pleasure. But when they try to leave the planet, they are overcome with debilitating withdrawal symptoms, forcing them to stay. Can they free themselves from this addiction?

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 1 As Sheppard and Ronon are trapped beneath a collapsed compound, McKay and Lorne are trapped in another pocket of debris. Michael’s flagship Wraith Cruiser hurtles towards the compound, while Carter leads a rescue mission. Who will reach them first?

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - The Seed
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 2 When Dr. Keller fails to report for her shift, concerned team members are shocked to discover her unconscious in her quarters. With the situation on Atlantis escalating, Woolsey is ultimately faced with a decision that could cost Keller her life.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Broken Ties
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 3 During an off-world mission, Ronon (Jason Momoa) is ambushed and captured by his former friend, Tyre (Mark Dacascos), and turned over to the Wraith. As the team scrambles for leads to locate their friend, Ronon undergoes a torturous ordeal.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - The Daedalus Variations
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 4 A drive malfunction aboard a mysterious duplicate Daedalus sends the team jumping through various alternate realities where they encounter sinister alien life forms, a searing sun, and a pitched space battle over Atlantis.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - The Ghost In The Machine
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 5 After a series of anomalies and power disruptions, the Atlantis team is faced with an impossible decision: to create the means to release a mysterious entity or stand by as it systematically destroys the city’s technological infrastructure.
